definition: a subdivision of a written work
details:
noun
- a subdivision of a written work
- a series of related events forming an episode
= example: a series of related events forming an episode
- a local branch of some fraternity or association
= example: a local branch of some fraternity or association
- an ecclesiastical assembly of the monks in a monastery or even of the canons of a church
- any distinct period in history or in a person's life
= example: any distinct period in history or in a person's life
